short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow you, as a viewer, to opt-out of raiding.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I hate falling asleep while watching my favorite streamer and waking up, in the middle of the night, with some random screaming in my ears. 
If you have the same problem, this is the extension for you.

Twitch Raid Opt-out, will detect the alert to join a twitch raid and click the cancel button automatically for you.

You welcome. Have fun!
